alert.note: Alert for Clark; Conway; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Perry; Pike; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 05 at 11:18AM CDT until May 09 at 3:01AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Arkansas, southeast Arkansas, southwest Arkansas and western Arkansas, including the following areas, in central Arkansas, Conway, Garland, Grant, Northwest Yell County, Perry, Pope County Higher Elevations, Pulaski, Saline, Southern Pope County and Yell Excluding Northwest. In southeast Arkansas, Bradley, Cleveland and Jefferson. In southwest Arkansas, Calhoun, Clark, Dallas, Hot Spring, Ouachita and Pike. In western Arkansas, Central and Eastern Montgomery County, Central and Southern Scott County, Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations, Northern Polk County Higher Elevations, Northern Scott County, Polk County Lower Elevations, Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations, Southern and Eastern Logan County, Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations and Western and Northern Logan County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional heavy rainfall is possible through this evening.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Conway; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Perry; Pike; Pulaski; Saline
